desc: INVEST IN DUBAI’S HOSPITALITY SECTORYOU ARE NOT BUYING A PROPERTY - YOUR ARE BUYING A SHARE STOCKGET YOUR INVESTOR RESIDENCY VISA7% NET ROI GUARENTEED FOR 10 YEARSAFTER 10 YEARS INVESTORS START TO GET INCOME FROM HOTEL REVENUE  BUY BACK OPTION WITH THE SAME PURCHASING PRICE AFTER 10 YEARS 4 FRACTIONS BY ROOM DLD CERTIFICATE OWNERSHIP FOR EACH7 DAYS FREE STAY PER YEARHighlights of SLS Dubai Hotel & ResidencesSLS Dubai Hotel & Residences makes you feel part of the progressive city of Dubai yet gives you a sense of serenity. Creating an avenue for comfortable yet chic living, SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences redefines living at an ambitious scale. Boasting 946 units, with 254 uniquely designed hotel rooms, 321 hotel apartments and 371 residences; spread over 75 floors, SLS Dubai IS one of the tallest hotels and residences in the region.  Having close proximity to Dubai’s notable districts, SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences is an urban oasis getting ready to rise. Two magnificent infinity pools are situated atop the 75-storey tower offering an incomparable 360-degree aspect of Dubai, making the pools among the highest not just in the city, but globally. Located in the Downtown district, the property offers spectacular, unobstructed views of the world’s tallest building Burj Khalifa, as well as Dubai Creek. Amenities of SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences is set within a beautiful space and surrounded by nature, being a sanctuary created in the middle of the city; SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences blends tranquility with the charm of the city. With every detail of the property having supreme attention, SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences exemplifies grandeur and elegance.  Masterfully designed as an all-encompassing community that provides the residents with a collection of expansive residential spaces, reinvents the city life by providing residents with the best amenities. Lap pool Leisure pool Kids pool Jacuzzi Spa Vitamin bar Gym Multipurpose room Concierge Residences dedicated lobbyPerfect Location•	3 minutes to Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa•	5 minutes to DIFC and Meydan One Mall•	10 minutes to Dubai International Airport•	15 minutes to Burj Al ArabGuests can also visit the hotels signature Ciel Spa located on the 69th floor, which is the epitome of luxury by boasting 7 treatment rooms, dedicated male and female thermal areas that contain steam rooms, experience showers, plunge pools and relaxing rooms, a hair and nail salon, a fully equipped gym and two outdoor terraces. Located in the sought-after location of Downtown Dubai providing early access to various key destination with its smooth connected road networks. The development is well connected to its smooth road networks with financial Center Road and Ras Al Khor Road which is also interconnected to Dubai- Al Ain Road. You can easily travel around the corners with its amazing connectivity with its key places including Burj Khalifa, Downtown Dubai, Business Bay, Dubai Mall, DIFC, Ras AL Khor Wildlife Sanctuary, and Dubai Creek. highlights: 100% ROI for 12 years. Handover soon
desc: The Heart of Europe, Dubai's WORLD islands, will be home to The Cote d' Azur, a luxury beach hotel. The contemporary Mediterranean style hotel become home to Premium Quality rooms, suites and deluxe apartments with balconies. The Cote d' Azur Hotel will be located on one of the prime beachfront areas of Main Europe Island at The Heart of Europe, close to the main gate and within walking distance to the amphitheater. You will be captivated and entertained by the marine life, the wonderful sights of spectacular nightly ﬁrework shows, or the exciting lifestyle of Rainbow Beach from sunrise to sunset. Indulge in your favourite activities and take to the water to sail, dive and enjoy a complete European shopping experience with some of the most unique European brands. OVERVIEW OF FACILITIES*Sea view suites, all with balconies *Grand Azur pool view suites, all with balconies *picturesque Courtyards*various Swimming Pools*landscaped Gardens*beautiful White Sandy Beach*Kids clubs*Diving and Snorkeling facilities*Cigar & Shisha Club*Bowling & Billiards Club *Rainbow Beach access*Monaco Beach Club *Fitness Facilities *Spas and Gyms *Squash Court *Authentic French restaurants *Retail shops *Raining Street *Snow Plaza *Anchorage areas. . . RESTAURANTS*Le Marché *La Provence *A Champagne and piano bar *La Boulangerie *Beach Club *La Brasserie *Le Cabaret. . . Take A Moment to Catch Your Breath. The World is visible from outer space, a collection of manmade islands that form a unique map of our planet. Surrounded by the Arabian Gulf, The World attracts a stunning variety of marine life all year round. The Heart of Europe is a destination of 7 islands set against the backdrop of The World Islands, Dubai. MONACO AT CÔTE D’AZURChic, international sensibility melds with cool heritage. Start the day with an authentic French breakfast at the French restaurant. Discover the best of beach life at Monaco Beach Club on Rainbow Beach – dine smart or barefoot. Relax in the sun and in the shade. Dance all day or chill in style at Grand Azur pool. Your partycation continues at The Grand Monaco Room – the epic Shisha and Cigar club where you can party all night – before heading to the Monaco Bowling Club to strike a few midnight bowls and back to Grand Azur again for live music and when the sun sets, it is time to go back to your suite for turquoise dreams. A JOURNEY ON THE FRENCH RIVIERAMonaco hotel offers you the best of the French Riviera from premium suites and penthouses with ultimate smart automation services available at all times to the majestic balconies with panoramic sea views, enjoy a fully connected lifestyle where entertainment and relaxation are within walking distance when you stay at Monaco Hotel be it for the day, for a staycation or for the full Summer. You are a few steps away from the Olympic-size swimming pool, the climate-controlled street, the white sandy beach, the Monaco Marina and the hotel gardens. This is the ultimate kind of vacation you will love to get used to, you will never want to leave!PARTY ROOMSThe Party Rooms at Monaco Hotel oﬀer an experience like nowhere else on the planet, redeﬁning living and recreational spaces beyond the conventional. Oﬀering some of the best amenities and luxurious interiors designed with a contemporary style. PARTY SUITESCareful design has extended outdoor and open plan living for guests to feast on the wonders of the glamorous Dubai skyline. An awe-inspiring interior design based on European modern living provides a luxurious living space for the lucky guests. RAINBOW BEACH is ready to chill and thrill The Heart of Europe as it adds 800 metres of prime shoreline with hospitality at its core and will be dotted with bent palm trees and colourful beach furniture. Rainbow Beach will take its place alongside famous beaches such as Rio’s Copacabana and Miami’s South Beach as it adds a long stretch of lifestyle pristine shoreline to The Heart of Europe’s 3,580 metres of white sandy beaches and the emirate’s celebrated coast. In the heart of the Mediterranean summer, Monaco Beach Club has something special to oﬀer to everyone. Here, tasteful warmth meets the French Riviera coolness. Unwind in stylish cabanas or on colorful sunbeds, set along white sands lining the turquoise waterfront of one of the most festive beach on the island. At the center of Côte d’Azur is the lagoon-shaped freshwater swimming pool Grand Azur. It is the largest and most sustainable pool in the Middle East. By the pool, you will be at the heart of our bustling beach club, with live music, ﬂoating cabanas, bar, all day a la carte menu and spa facilities at your ﬁngertips. Imagine retro jukeboxes, red velvet sofas and red curtains opening on billiards tables. The Monaco Bowling Club is the place to be surprised! It’s the classic with a twist, all-day long deluxe bowling lounge where you start with an after-party breakfast at sunrise and return for lunch, happy hour and side dancing around the clock. The Grand Monaco Room is an exclusive Shisha & Cigar Club with both an ‘Apéritif room’ and a lounge. The GMR oﬀers membership to the hotel guests, men and women, who appreciate the pleasures of the world’s ﬁnest cigars and shisha ﬂavours as well as the year-round company of those who share this and other lifestyle interests. La Brasserie de Monaco is the new all-day Mediterranean brasserie where you start with an authentic French breakfast or lunch and return mid-afternoon for crêpes and in the evening for cocktails, fresh oysters and chatting round the clock. Never ending nights. Le Cabaret is a Theatre restaurant bar inspired by the cabarets of 19th century Monaco ﬁlled with shimmers and magic. Upon arrival you are taken to the magicians top hat bar to enjoy a cocktail, a serious spirit or perhaps a magic potion, then you are ushered to your seats in the cabaret lounge. Next… lights, curtain smoke and mirrors as the ‘French can can’ dancers with stunning costumes, acrobats or magicians lead you into a world of shimmers and magic and make-believe featuring swords, shiny blades, doves, cards and other surprises. LE MARCHÉ is a unique restaurant concept closely inspired by French Epiceries, that oﬀers a collection of great classics, hidden gems and exclusive references across 8 departments such as: Bakery | Pastries | Chocolates | Cheese | Cuts | Roast | Crepes | Delicatessen. The setting is that of an iconic French Village main street and its atmospheric window displays that transports you through time and places in France, with a long linage of traditional recipes some of them dating as far back as 1751. LE MARCHÉ is a treasure trove of ideas for gifts and gourmet delights targeting a wide audience with a ‘sweet tooth’ and a ‘savory tooth’ in a French themed atmosphere. Exciting investment opportunities are available. For more information and availability contact Yana:

highlights: Fully Furnished | Sea View | Modern Tower
desc: We are please to present this fully furnished, one-bedroom apartment at the Address Residences Dubai Opera. The project is envisaged to set new standards in luxury and service. The design of the two modern towers of 64 and 56 storeys is inspired by the sailboats of the Arabian Sea. Between them, an expansive podium presents an outstanding array of retail, leisure and entertainment facilities for you to indulge your every desire. The naval-inspired two-tower complex rises majestically in The Opera District — a flourishing cultural hub only a stone throw’s away from the Burj Khalifa and The Dubai Mall. Its exceptional location enables you to reach your favourite hotspots in the city with utmost ease. The superb address also affords one of the closest proximities to the Burj Khalifa compared to any other residence in Dubai. Enjoy the distinctive urban fabric, where the concept of ‘live, work, play’ gets re-imagined every day. The proud homeowners of Address Residences Dubai Opera will enjoy a myriad of attractions—from Dubai Opera being only moments away, to numerous restaurants on either side of The Dubai Fountain, as well as The Dubai Mall and its many retail and entertainment venues. Designed to make residents and guests feel at home, Address Residences Dubai Opera offers five-star concierge service for your ultimate comfort and convenience. You can also enjoy stellar amenities, including lounges, a swimming pool, a gym, a kids’ club and a vast landscaped terrace. Please get in touch with me to know more about this fantastic development

Business Bay is a bustling mixed-use district in Dubai known for its residential buildings, commercial developments and entertainment venues. Redefining luxury living in the district is the supertall skyscraper SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences. The award-winning Aedas designed the 75-storey mixed-use building architecture while Paul Bishop designed interiors. A project of World of Wonders Real Estate Development (WOW RED), the high-rise building has four distinct zones making it one-of-its-kind development in the emirate. The overall exterior resembles a ‘honeycomb’ whereas individual zones are customised by rotating the units by 45 degrees in 4 different axes to ensure panoramic views of the district and complete privacy between units.
